Hello! I am a graduate from Cal Poly San Luis Obispo with my Master's & Bachelor's of Science degrees in Statistics. For those interested, I would describe myself as a versatile, pragmatic, and detail-oriented individual interested in the fields of statistics, project management, real estate, sports, finance, and music. Through my experiences in academia, jobs, internships, and extracurriculars, I have developed an extensive skill set that allows me to succeed in many different environments.
